items.title: Trump Authorizes Military Occupation Of Public Land Along Southern Border To Repel Migrant ‘Invasions’
items.description: President Donald Trump authorized a 'military mission for sealing the southern border of the United States and repelling invasions.'

items.title: Trump Restored Showerhead Freedom, Now Let’s Fix The Sneaky Regulation Process
items.description: Citizens are helpless against government regulations. Without Trump’s intervention, Americans would be stuck with low quality showers.

items.title: Another Day, Another Alleged Would-Be Trump Assassin Charged
items.description: Shawn Monper, 32, of Butler, Pennsylvania, faces federal charges of making threats to assault and murder President Trump, Musk, and others.

items.title: After 4 Years Of Claiming US Elections Are ‘Most Secure Ever,’ Leftists Again Accuse Trump Of Stealing Them
items.description: Democrats are claiming Trump could rig the next election, after years of smearing election integrity advocates as 'election deniers.'
